long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Infinitab provides a clean looking New Tab experience, with finely curated and functional design.
If you’re looking for a minimalist homepage but you don’t want to sacrifice productivity, then Infinitab is the Chrome extension for you. Not only you get access to distinctively crafted light and dark Themes, but you can also customize to your liking several Settings to make each New Tab a productive yet minimal Dashboard.

★ Search bar 
Quickly perform your searches on Google and YouTube with a convenient always-ready search bar.

★ Local time
Display the current day and time with several options to customize how the date and the clock are shown.

★ Themes
Get access to 12 light and dark themes that are distinctively minimal yet functional. Once you start using them, you won't likely do without.

★ Privacy
Infinitab is 100% private and safe by design. We do not collect any data on you and we never will.

★ Localized
Let Infinitab welcome you in your own language in each New Tab. Currently, we support English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, and Indonesian.


Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to reach out to us at helloinfinitab@gmail.com
long.de,es,fr,id,it,pt_PT,ru:
Meet Infinitab!
A clean and modern looking Chrome homepage with finely curated and functional design.

Infinitab currently offers:
- Search bar (Google, YouTube)
- 12 light and dark themes
- Local time with multiple customization options
- Localization in 8 languages (English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Indonesian)
- 100% private and safe

Do you like Infinitab? Then give us a 5-star rating :-)
And if you have any suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at helloinfinitab@gmail.com
